description: If you're a huge Tennessee fan, this is the app for you!  Tennessee Football Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, standings and scores. You'll always know what's happening with the team!   Plus you’ll find team and schedule information, so you’ll always be the most knowledgeable fan in the room.   You can also discuss the latest news and highlights with other Tennessee fans using the built in chat feature. Make sure your voice is heard!   There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with Tennessee. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Tennessee Football Fans today!    ** Brighthouse Labs, and the Tennessee Football Fans application are in no way associated with the NFL or the Tennessee Titans. All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
